items.title: New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani is sworn in at public ceremony
items.description: Zohran Mamdani, the first Muslim mayor of New York City, was sworn in Thursday, marking a generational shift in the city’s leadership with his promise...

items.title: White House lays out nine-week timeline to win approval for Trump’s ballroom
items.description: Trump is seeking to gain approvals for his ballroom in just over two months that have taken other large projects years to complete.

items.title: She provides the raw material to Trump’s influencer machine
items.description: Margo Martin, a lesser-known member of the president’s staff, fuels social media with a blitz of Trump content.

items.title: Trump is reconstituting the Fine Arts panel set to review his ballroom
items.description: The White House is seeking members likely to clear the way for President Donald Trump’s controversial ballroom and other projects.

items.title: Chief justice says rule of law is strong at time of rising concerns
items.description: Chief Justice John Roberts said in his annual year-end report on the judiciary that the nation’s founding charters remain robust.
